title: mADida enna
sahitya:
mADida enna bhakIranu sadguru mADida enna bhakIra


caraNam 1    anubhava gappari hrdayada jOLige ennaya kanguLaliTTa 
AmiSa dhaTTi aragina roTTi ennaya kaiyaliTTa
    caraNam 2    nAdada tamburi mAdamandAravu niccangada ToppigeniTTa 
bOdhada bhangi amrtada lungi samAna guLigeyaniTTa
    caraNam 3    I pari mADi bayalana tOri karavanu nettiyaliTTa 
bhUpa purandara viTTalarAyanu tirugendappaNe koTTa
